sentences.english: One day, I realize from experience to am choked with tears am what kind.
sentences.chinese: 某一天，我體悟到痛哭失聲是怎樣的。

sentences.english: Gulistan's insight into life can be found in her paintings.
sentences.chinese: 古麗通過她的繪畫完成着她對生命的體悟。

sentences.english: Hong Ling's works show his realization in this field.
sentences.chinese: 洪凌的作品顯示出他對此深有體悟。

sentences.english: It's the fruit of their life experiences and understanding of their surroundings.
sentences.chinese: 那是他們生活經歷及對境遇體悟的成果。

sentences.english: The proper name is the instantaneous apprehension of a multiplicity.
sentences.chinese: 專有名詞就是對於多重性的當下體悟。

definition: to know from experience/to learn through experience/to realize/understanding/experience
to sense/to perceive/to come to realize/to be aware
practice/to put into practice/to live up to (a promise)/to carry out (a project)
to enlighten/to explain (a text etc)/to stimulate (a mental attitude)/enlightenment/revelation/motivation
immediately/at once/at that moment/at the moment
to sublimate/sublimation (physics)/to raise to a higher level/to refine/promotion
(of Taoists) to practice austerities/to practice asceticism
